page.title: 05NEWS FROM THE BUCKS EXAMINER
page.content: CHESHAM CARNIVAL. This year the theme for Chesham Carnival was "Heroes and Heroines".The procession of decorated floats was the highlight of the day,with people lining the streets.The carnival was opened by Chloe Ashcroft.In the arena their was a breakdance competion,and a field gun competion.The music was supplied by Chesham Boys Brigade and a local youth club.There was also a display by the Royal Marines. A big attraction was the five a side football competion,with all schools in Chesham entering.There were a number of side stalls,such as the biggest tombola in the world;a coconut shy;amatuer radio;and a fortune teller There was a Punch and Judy show,and a pig roast,organised by Chesham Rugby club.The day was a success.
